attributes.action: make teaching the Universal Declaration of Human Rights compulsory in all schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Universal Declaration on Human Rights is 60 years old in 2008. It is one of the foundations of modern society, but how many people know "their rights"?
Teaching all articles of the declaration in schools and encouraging debate around it will instill in the next generation a desire to enshrine, defend and protect the rights of all humans.

HOW CAN WE PROTECT OUR HUMAN RIGHTS IF WE DON'T KNOW WHAT THEY ARE?
